channel.title: Canoe Station does not work!
channel.description:
Hello everyone , [ Source - Hyperion!] I would like to add Canoe Station to my server , actually its already in it but it doesn't work. when I press on it it says ( Nothing interesting happens ) To help me trough Teamviewer add me on skype! Lsdevil112 !
Thank you for your time!

item.title: Canoe Station does not work!
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

You want to look into the button click packet - try debugging to get the button ids then assign events to them, in your case cutting the canoe (check player inv for knife and logs). Then spawn the object, only for the player and finally handle the object action 1 packet to do the actual transportation.

ps You should definitely add some form of packet verification, so that people don’t teleport to the locations from all over the map, ie check if a canoe was spawned for the given player (set a flag) and their distance to its cached position.

Read full topic
